name: Angel Noir
description:
LOTS OF BUGS. I'M WORKIN ON IT!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED YOU PLAY THE DOWNLOADED VERSION. Can you separate the angels from the sinners?

In Angel Noir, you are tasked with that goal. 

CONTENT WARNING

This game contains Mentions of death, Minor jumpscares, Mild language and General creepiness. Do not play if you are easily spooked or young.

Controls:

Literally just mouse.
